WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I could use some help with this.
I am now so far that I can show the Accordion. But it would be really nice if it would work like this:
When you click on an event in the Events_Calendar or in Events_list, the related items is shown in Events_view.
 
What I am looking for is that the related AccordionPane is opened automatically when you click on an event in Calendar or list.
 
[url:http://site368.mysite4now.com/lexvis/webs/Events_Accordion.aspx]
 
If I am not mistaken the following piece of code should be adapted, and I guess we need some Java.
 
 
<asp:HyperLink ID="HyperLink1" runat="server" Text='<%#Eval("title") %>' NavigateUrl='<%# "Events_view.aspx?Eventid=" &Convert.ToString( Eval("ID"))%>' ToolTip='<%# truncate(Convert.ToString(Eval("Bijzperdat"))) %>' />
 
This is beyond my grasp. (for now)
 
Lex
